title: Four back rooms
creator_credit: Peter M Sims, Kenneth J. Fairbairn, Edgar H. Anstey and British Transport Films
brief_description: An indication of the research being carried out by the British Transport Commission in matters affecting transport and communications. Four examples of the work are given: design of railway lines; effect of counter currents on sea waves; siltage in rivers; stresses and strains in bus construction.
